testcase.name: To check the Logout functionality - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given User opens the browser................................................passed And User navigates to the URL "https://magento.softwaretestingboard.com/"...passed When User clicks the link "Sign In".........................................passed And User enters valid email "jayanthaws2000@gmail.com" and password "9948640337@27a".passed And User clicks the "Sign In" button........................................passed And User clicks "Logout" from "My Account" page.............................passed Then User verifies that the session ends and the user is redirected to the homepage.passed And User verifies the "Home Page" is displayed..............................passed
